title: When your own teammates ban the champion you want to be.
body: So Today I have played 5 draft matches. Got first pick on all of them and all in the lane I want to be in pretty luck right WRONG. Every time I picked my mid laner. My own team would ban the person I picked Where the heck did teambuilder go. Because this doesn't happen in TEAMBUILDER. Riot plz fix this. Because if the other team bans the champ I want I shake it off but it reall bothers me when I get first pick and my team bans the champ I want to be. Riot please do something cause I cry every time. Also I don't know what Board this would be best in cause I don't post all to often but I try to.

replies.body: Its totally legit if you are first pick RED side.  That makes you second pick out of the ten players, and odds are your OP Ban worthy champ will be picked away.
Yes that is true but it sucks when my own team bans my non-ban worthy champ
